com.facebook.react.modules.core

    • 方法详细资料

      • callTimers

        public void callTimers(WritableArray timerIDs)
        从接口复制的说明: JavaScriptTimerManager
        Calls the JS callback(s) associated with the timer ID(s). Also unregisters the callback if the timer isn't recurring (e.g. unregisters for setTimeout, doesn't for setInterval).
        指定者:
        callTimers 在接口中 JavaScriptTimerManager
        参数:
        timerIDs - An array of timer handles to call. Accepts an array as an optimization, to avoid unnecessary JNI calls.

      • callIdleCallbacks

        public void callIdleCallbacks(double frameTime)
        从接口复制的说明: JavaScriptTimerManager
        Invoke the JS callback registered with `requestIdleCallback`.
        指定者:
        callIdleCallbacks 在接口中 JavaScriptTimerManager
        参数:
        frameTime - The amount of time left in the frame, in ms.

      • emitTimeDriftWarning

        public void emitTimeDriftWarning(java.lang.String warningMessage)
        从接口复制的说明: JavaScriptTimerManager
        Shows a warning message in development when environment times are out of sync.
        指定者:
        emitTimeDriftWarning 在接口中 JavaScriptTimerManager
        参数:
        warningMessage - The message to show
